episodes.title: Cult Leaders And Forced Child Labor: The Alarming Details
episodes.description:
Cult leaders convicted of forcing children to work 16-hour days without pay

⭐Want More Crime News? https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLc0teciswGHJzI4YQMlyJbmEZfJFx3a64
-----
Several leaders of the United Nation of Islam (UNOI), a Kansas-based cult, were recently convicted for exploiting children in a forced labor scheme. The cult leaders coerced children into working up to 16-hour days without pay, under the threat of severe punishment, including beatings and threats of "eternal hellfire." The children were housed in overcrowded, unsanitary conditions and cut off from the outside world. The convicted members, including Kaaba Majeed and others, face prison sentences for conspiracy and forced labor
-----
⭐Here's the documentary I mentioned in the video - https://youtu.be/lx5dU-UVg60?si=19bYC4_UZpKfNs8O
